name: Asteroid Destroyer (De_R1k)
description:
Asteroid Destroyer

A small game where you need to destroy all the asteroids before they reach your home planet.

Controls

This game has simple controls.  Use WASD or the arrowkeys to move and the spacebar to shoot.

Requirements

You only need a keyboard. This game can probably be played on any computer/laptop.

Download

Download the file below. Unzip the file. Then click on the "AsteroidDestroyer.exe".
